body.p: {{tp331|Your task is to decide on the correctness of statements based on the initial listening. We recommend to proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli332|Then, play the recording and try to capture the information concerning the individual statements. When listening, you can simultaneously mark the correct answers.}}
{{tli333|If the statement is true, left click TRUE. If the statement is false, left click FALSE.}}
{{tli334|If you wish to change your selection, click another option.}}
{{tli335|If you do not capture all the information, you can listen to the recording repeatedly.}}
{{tli336|Playing sound can be interrupted anytime by clicking Pause button and then continued by clicking Play button.}}
{{tli337|Recording can be played from any place you choose. By clicking recording indicator specify the point from which you wish to start playing. Then click Play button.}}
